short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows user to share his desktop screens with other participants of Coffee Table Video Meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen sharing extension for Coffee Table video meetings. For Chrome browser only. For any issues or queries, contact us on support@coffeetable.vc
